location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Abstract Manifest of Treasures, Pearls and Freight laden at Bushire on the Revenge, Robert Freeman Gage, Commodore and Commander for Bombay.

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged and has several holes in its text.

mods.abstract: List of the goods on board the Revengewith details of to whom they were shipped, to whom they were consigned and of their value.
